start_information: Your working directory is the local digitizer repository!
head: 1.Create templates for maps or symbols
save_template: Save the cropped map or symbol as template
lab2: Add number to the file name
inf: Important! Save the cropped map in
inf1: The map templates saved in /data/templates/maps/ will be used to match to the content of the files in your input directory for extracting maps.
inf2: Important! Save the cropped symbol in
inf3: The symbol templates saved in /data/templates/symbols will be used to match to the content of the files in your output directory with extracted maps (/output/classification/matching).
